result.title: Can vector iterators be used as linked lists?
result.content: vector iterators or any other iterators in c++ language can be used as linked list ? for example : if there is a vector a = {1,2,3,4,5,6,7} and another vector b={8,9} can I transfer some elements of vector a to vector b such that a becomes {1,2,3,4,5} and b becomes {8,9,6,7} through vector iterators. If possible explain through a code?
